venue.address_1: 33 Stanhope St. (in the alley behind Mistrale between Clarendon and Berkely and Columbus)
venue.name: Brahmin

item.description: Social Sundays is back for a Valentine's Edition. The brunch party will be party 3 of the Cupid Challenge taking place all weekend. More info here: http://crawlinboston.... Please wear red, pink or black. Check out the pictures here from some of our past events https://picasaweb.goo... https://picasaweb.goo... https://picasaweb.goo... The mimosas and screwdrivers quickly turned to shots which quickly turned to dancing. Guests will be enticed by a delicious brunch menu as DJ Chris Roxx spins an infectious playlist. The lights will be dimmed, the shades will be closed, corks will be popping and we’ll be featuring $3 screwdrivers as well as a fresh brunch food menu. http://crawlinboston.... Tired of the same old, same old brunch scene in Boston? We’re flipping the switch and keeping the weekend going on Sunday. This brunch is not for the conservative or the weary. No kids, no chores, no errands, no laundry…come ready to party, forget about real life for the afternoon. Grab your friends and check out Boston’s new hot scene as the weather gets cold. This is a truly unique experience where dancing on tables is encouraged. Come on down and see us. Reservations not required but encouraged. We've sold out our tables for the past 2 brunches. Please call 617-723-3131 to make yours
item.name: Valentine's Brunch - Bar Crawl After Party
